website_summaries.verdict: Outstanding hairdressing scissors that prove you can get a great cut from an affordable tool.
pros: Crafted of strong stainless steel with a stylish black colour and ergonomic structure
Tension screw is easy to adjust
Nice overall quality, especially when you consider the affordable price point
cons: Some inconsistencies in quality, as most scissors have very sharp blades while a few were quite blunt

customer_reviews.title: best shears and super sharp
customer_reviews.text: Best haircutting shears I have even owned except for very expensive ones from Germany. I am a retired hairdresser and needed some new shears for my own hair and family haircuts. I didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars on home haircutting tools, these got good reviews, so I bought them. I have never bought shears sight unseen before. They are wonderful. Super sharp -- I have cut into my fingers a few times proving just how dull my old shears really were! These are truly right OR left hand scissors and work just as well either way.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLynnea

customer_reviews.title: Scissors are great for the purpose I bought them for which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Scissors are great for the purpose I bought them for which is keeping the hair around my little dogs eyes clear of build up. Also works great on the back end too to keep the hair clear there. They are sharp, easy to handle. Length of scissor could be a little longer for better manipulation.
customer_reviews.author: Caryle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of researching for good scissors because I’m not a hair stylist or know brands, etc. And I’m glad I went with these ones! Smooth cutting and the feel of the scissors themself are nice and heavy, and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Well made scissors
customer_reviews.text: This scissors is of pure quality. You can tell that great craftsmanship was put into making it.
customer_reviews.author: Jèan R.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts fine hair well
customer_reviews.text: Comments went to seller's page. I commented on ordering on March 23rd. So now I am updating my comment: I received the scissors! This product took a long time to get to me. Good grip for small and medium sized hands/fingers. The scissors cut fine hair very well and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with - I'm not a professional. Lol. But, to me, these are nice. Especially for the price! I love them. I also really like the case they came with.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Cut
customer_reviews.text: Oohhh, very high quality, smooth cutting motion and just the right size. Really excellent pair of scissors! I plan to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: "Raven"

customer_reviews.title: I'm an amateur, they seem quality
customer_reviews.text: got to trim own hair and pleased they seem heavy duty, sharp and comforatable. havent used but expect they work great
customer_reviews.author: Raguel

customer_reviews.title: Classy Sharp Shears
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a handsome magnetic clasp velvet lined case.Very sharp. Perfect for trimming fast growing bangs. Paid for themselves already.
customer_reviews.author: Peachey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional, so spending a lot would not make sense. These scissors I would consider professional grade and a great buy for their quality.
customer_reviews.author: James Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small finger holes, going to try and use. Will see.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp. The best hairdressing scissors I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp. The best hairdressing scissors I've tried. I cut all my family member's hair with them and they've lasted really well. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Cut Hair
customer_reviews.text: The scissors brand new, sharp blade cut hair easily. The small size made it the scissors easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finger holes much too small for my hands that aren't that big.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Friedlander

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Excellent feel to the cutting action. Very smooth movement. Very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! Nice case it comes in. Pleasing appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very comfortable scissors and they are sharp. How long will they last? We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Joy F V

customer_reviews.title: A Cut Above!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are truly professional quality. Razor sharp and they look like they'll stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Atheniakid

customer_reviews.title: These sheers are AMAZING! They are very sharp
customer_reviews.text: These sheers are AMAZING! They are very sharp , adjustable, and great quality especially for the price. My clients love the way I cut there hair with them and how clean there hairstyle looks after I trim/cut/layer their hair. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: desiree Christian

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Good deal
customer_reviews.text: They're everything they're cracked up to be. Very satisfied. Good deal, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for trimming. Basically to get rid of the split ends and stangled hair. Not for professional use. I am impressed by how sharp it is. Basically, it touches my hair without any pressure it make the cut. I am very satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: tong wu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very high quality and reasonably priced, so sharp i cut my fingers.. be careful with this one !!
customer_reviews.author: Alper

customer_reviews.title: Nice short scissors
customer_reviews.text: Good quality scissors. A bit shorter than needed (6.5" would have been better) but they work well and my misjudging length need is on me, not Sanguine.
customer_reviews.author: NHM

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sleek, sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love these shears! They are stylish, sleek, and very sharp. The black finish is gorgeous and the case is very nice. I use them to cut my pixie at home. No complaints, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MJ723

customer_reviews.title: These are great scissors❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love these scissors! I'm not a professional, but I can cut hair nicely. These are very sharp and cuts my husbands hair so well.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Caroline

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Use for cutting families hair --a useful and easy to use tool
customer_reviews.author: tony porto

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY SHARP!! You have to be really careful with them! But they cut great! Hair seems to build up on the scissors if the hair is wet. Very easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: mmbbdd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value - professional quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic scissors for the price - even for a pro!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Professional Barber Shears
customer_reviews.text: Super quick delivery. Item as described and what I wanted. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ozgard

customer_reviews.title: Good steel scissors
customer_reviews.text: Very nice barber scissors, made of real steel not stainless, so they stay sharp longer.
customer_reviews.author: D JANES

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are the sharpest high precision sciroors. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jes

customer_reviews.title: Great value, Very high quality! Buy em, thank me later!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these, very sharp. Easy to get in to that one long strand on your eyebrows (hint guys, unless you want all the ladies chasing a well groomed man).
customer_reviews.author: C David Deweese

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Good professional shears are expensive, very expensive. These shears are quite inexpensive, but functional. They aren't properly balanced, so if you don't use them just right they will fold rather than cut hair. The screw can't remedy the lack of proper balancing. If you tighten it enough to keep the shears from folding the hair, the action is like kitchen shears. They work ok, and are adequately sharp. I definitely got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Quinault

customer_reviews.title: Sucks! This product came from London
customer_reviews.text: This shears does not fit my fingers. I wanted to return,but have to pay for the return myself. The money that i will pay for return is higher than the money i paid for shears. So i will not return ,but i can't use this shears. Sucks ! This product came from London, GB.
customer_reviews.author: T C

product_meta.title: Sanguine Professional Hairdressing Scissors, 5.5 inch, 14 cm, Deep Black
product_meta.description: Professional barber shears, hair cutting shears, black, 5.5 inch long. These hair scissors are really great for detailed work.
feature_bullets: Professional Barber Shears, Hairdressing Scissors - 5.5 inch (14cm), Black
Extremely sharp blades for clean cut, will not damage or split hair ends
Hand crafted, made from Japanese steel (J2) will stay sharper much longer
Round, smooth tension screw system gives a greater required tuning
Remove-able finger rest. Please note: these scissors don't come with old black case anymore!
